name: ffxiv-repeater-tool
short_description:
You can use this repeater tool to automate the login process while attempting to login to FFXIV: A Realm Reborn during the times you receive error 1017.

Simply click the .exe file you downloaded, open and login to the game, press the "PAUSE/BREAK" button on your keyboard when you are at the game lobby and it will begin doing its' thing.

If you wish to pause the execution of the program, simply press the "PAUSE/BREAK" button again.

Once you are logged in, simply press the "ESC" key to end the program.


*** NOTES ***
Note 1: I am not responsible for any negative actions taken by Square Enix or their subsidiaries to your account. This is an automated program the runs in the background to assist you in the login process, however because it is an automated program, their may be negative actions taken by Square Enix against users of this program.

Note 2: Once you download the file, you may need to right click on it, go to Properties and click "Unlock" to be able to use it.
